name: Golf with your Dice
description:
Golf with your Dice
(In case you don't have any friends.)

A small mini golf game where you shoot a die instead of a ball.  Each side of the die applies a different change to the die, like moon gravity or playing super monkey die.

Conquer all 3 courses and post your score!

Download the game when you have performance issues in the browser!

Submission for the GMTK Game Jam 2022
Theme: Roll of the Dice
